title: docker-compose.yml 并用 Docker Compose 启动服务   neo4j安装失败
body:

author: zhangqaws

comments.body: Thank you for your feedback. Please delete the local cache and pull the latest openspg-neo4j image again
Thank you，The problem has been resolved @andylau-55
